
| Actions                  | Resources | Allow  | Deny                         |
|--------------------------|-----------|--------|------------------------------|
| manager:read             | *         | *      |                              |
| manager:delete_file      | file:path |        | etc/rules/local_rules.xml    |
| manager:read_file        | file:path |        | *                            |
| manager:upload_file      | *         | *      |                              |
| manager:restart          | *         | *      |                              |
| manager:upload_config    | *         |        | *                            |
| manager:read_api_config  | *         |        | *                            |
